field_intro.value: Do you find it hard to source Drupal developers? I bet I can help you.

body.value:
Thank you for the excellent recommendation! We truly appreciate your help and will definitely reach out when we have any future needs.

Mohammed Rezam, Vardot

I am very well-connected in the Drupal community. I have a lot of people asking me if I know of anyone hiring, and I have a lot of people hiring asking me if I know of any good Drupal developers that are currently available.

So, I thought, why not create a service around this?

Drupal developers looking for work

We asked Mark to help us recruit one Drupal developer. The quality of people he referred us to was so good, we ended up hiring two of them.

Paul Jenkins, Big Blue Door

I have two criteria for whom I will recommend:

  1. I know you personally (have worked with you, worked on issues together on Drupal, met at conferences, etc) and/or
  2. I can validate your work from open source sources (blog posts, presentations, Drupal, GitHub)

If you meet those criteria, and are currently available for Drupal work, feel free to fill out this form.

If I recommend you to someone, and they hire you, just let me know and I'll send them an invoice for my service.

I wanted to share the exciting news that I secured the role you recommended to me. I truly appreciate your support and guidance throughout this process. Thank you for your efforts in connecting great companies with talented individuals like me.

Need to hire Drupal developers?

“Thanks to Mark I quickly found the perfect Drupal partner to work with for my project. Not only did his personal connections get me to the right people fast, but thanks to his expertise I can feel confident about his recommendation.”

Remmert, JamesBondLifestyle.com

If you are looking to hire a Drupal developer, pre-vetted by me (a Drupal core maintainer), just get in contact and if I know of anyone available I'll send them your way (or you their way).

How much does it cost?

The cost for this service for recruiters/agencies is €1,500* per person you hire (ex-VAT, if applicable). If you don't hire someone I recommend to you, there's no cost.

The cost for Drupal developers looking for work is FREE.

* Sterling: £1,250, Dollar: $1,600
